Kankurō has [[Karasu]] sprout many poison-covered blades on his arms and mouth and sends them spinning towards the opponent like a tornado, slashing them several times. After launching the opponent into the air, Karasu explodes near them. Karasu is unharmed by this explosion.

== Trivia ==
* In the English version, the blade in Karasu's mouth is removed, making it appear pointlessly opened.

[[pl:Kugutsu: Kaijin Tensen]]
